parameters.name: AdviceDate
parameters.description: The date when the suggestion is generated. Specify the date in the yyyyMMdd format. The date must be in UTC.

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of Data Warehouse Edition (V3.0) clusters.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
